Sentencas: High-resolution transmission electron microscopy (HREM) was used to identify a La(Sr)-deficient ordered nonstoichiometry in perovskite-like La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 which is used in solid oxide fuel cell technology.
Titulo: ORDERED LA(SR)-DEFICIENT NONSTOICHIOMETRY IN LA0.8SR0.2MNO3 OBSERVED BY HIGH-RESOLUTION TRANSMISSION ELECTRON-MICROSCOPY

Sentencas: Experimental 400 kV HREM images were recorded in the crystal projections [112] and [110] with the objective lens defocused to Delta f = -40 nm and Delta f = -185 nm.
Titulo: ORDERED LA(SR)-DEFICIENT NONSTOICHIOMETRY IN LA0.8SR0.2MNO3 OBSERVED BY HIGH-RESOLUTION TRANSMISSION ELECTRON-MICROSCOPY

Sentencas: They show very good agreement with simulated images which are based on an ideal perovskite structure with 12.5 +/- 5% of the La(Sr) atoms being deficient on every second {111} plane.
Titulo: ORDERED LA(SR)-DEFICIENT NONSTOICHIOMETRY IN LA0.8SR0.2MNO3 OBSERVED BY HIGH-RESOLUTION TRANSMISSION ELECTRON-MICROSCOPY

Sentencas: The actual rhombohedral distortion of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 alone, as determined by X-ray diffraction, is not responsible for the observed HREM image contrasts.
Titulo: ORDERED LA(SR)-DEFICIENT NONSTOICHIOMETRY IN LA0.8SR0.2MNO3 OBSERVED BY HIGH-RESOLUTION TRANSMISSION ELECTRON-MICROSCOPY

Sentencas: In addition, possible ordering of the strontium atoms could be excluded with the help of image simulations.
Titulo: ORDERED LA(SR)-DEFICIENT NONSTOICHIOMETRY IN LA0.8SR0.2MNO3 OBSERVED BY HIGH-RESOLUTION TRANSMISSION ELECTRON-MICROSCOPY
